about_the_game:
Here is the translation of the updated text:

This is a casual puzzle game that combines mathematical calculations and basic elimination gameplay. In the game, you can slide the mouse to determine the movement direction of all "blocks," and through repeated decisions, gradually strengthen the "Blue Legion" to ultimately defeat the evil "Red Legion."

Gameplay Instructions:

  • Slide the mouse to control the movement of all blocks

  • Blocks of the same color and value can merge to strengthen the legion’s power

  • If a block's value is greater than or equal to the enemy’s, it can "eat" the enemy and generate a new block

  • Control your Blue Legion and achieve victory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
